attribute.name: asyncSupported
attribute.description: Does this valve support async reporting.

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: stateName
attribute.description: The name of the LifecycleState that this component is currently in

attribute.name: authenticationCookieName
attribute.description: The name of the cookie used to persist authentication state

attribute.name: authenticationHeaderName
attribute.description: The name of the http header used to hold basic authentication if authenticationMode is HTTP_HEADER_AUTH

attribute.name: authenticationParameterName
attribute.description: The name of the http parameter used to hold se secret if authenticationMode is HTTP_PARAM_AUTH

attribute.name: authenticationUri
attribute.description: The URI used to for FORM_AUTH

attribute.name: seed
attribute.description: Seed used to hash the secret key

attribute.name: authenticationEntryPointName
attribute.description: The authentication entry point (FORM_AUTH, BASIC_AUTH, HTTP_PARAM_AUTH or HTTP_HEADER_AUTH)

attribute.name: ignoredUriRegexp
attribute.description: Regular expression to defined the URIs that are not authentication (favicon.ico, ...)
